Amos__06.1: Woe to you that are wealthy in Sion, and to you that have confidence in the mountain of Samaria: ye great men, heads of the people, that go in with state into the house of Israel.
Amos__06.2: Pass ye over to Chalane, and see, and go from thence into Emath the great: and go down into Geth of the Philistines, and to all the best kingdoms of these: if their border be larger than your border.
Amos__06.3: You that are separated unto the evil day: and that approach to the throne of iniquity;
Amos__06.4: You that sleep upon beds of ivory, and are wanton on your couches: that eat the lambs out of the flock, and the calves out of the midst of the herd;
Amos__06.5: You that sing to the sound of the psaltery: they have thought themselves to have instruments of music like David;
Amos__06.6: That drink wine in bowls, and anoint themselves with the best ointments: and they are not concerned for the affliction of Joseph.
Amos__06.7: Wherefore now they shall go captive at the head of them that go into captivity: and the faction of the luxurious ones shall be taken away.
Amos__06.8: The Lord God hath sworn by his own soul, saith the Lord the God of hosts: I detest the pride of Jacob, and I hate his houses, and I will deliver up the city with the inhabitants thereof.
Amos__06.9: And if there remain ten men in one house, they also shall die.
Amos__06.10: And a man's kinsman shall take him up, and shall burn him, that he may carry the bones out of the house; and he shall say to him that is in the inner rooms of the house: Is there yet any with thee?
Amos__06.11: And he shall answer: There is an end. And he shall say to him: Hold thy peace, and mention not the name of the Lord.
Amos__06.12: For behold the Lord hath commanded, and he will strike the greater house with breaches, and the lesser house with clefts.
Amos__06.13: Can horses run upon the rocks, or can any one plough with buffles? for you have turned judgment into bitterness, and the fruit of justice into wormwood.
Amos__06.14: You that rejoice in a thing of nought: you that say: Have we not taken unto us horns by our own strength?
Amos__06.15: But behold, I will raise up a nation against you, O house of Israel, saith the Lord the God of hosts; and they shall destroy you from the entrance of Emath, even to the torrent of the desert.
